---
title: "Lab News"
description: "Latest updates, awards, and events from the Interactive Robot Design Lab."
listing:
  contents: "cms/*.qmd"       # Lists all other .qmd files in this folder
  sort: "date desc" # Newest first
  type: default     # Options: default, table, grid, date-read
  categories: true  # Adds a sidebar filter for tags (e.g. "Awards", "Papers")
  sort-ui: false    # Hide the "Sort By" dropdown (cleaner look)
  filter-ui: true   # Keep the Search bar
  fields: [date, title, description, categories, image]
  image-placeholder: "/images/robot.jpg" # Fallback if a post has no image
title-block-banner: true
---
